Text:
●Guard parry
When guarding (hold ∈＋∋)
If you shake wiimote at precise moment
parry will happen
allowing for counter attack


●Clash
If your and enemy melee attack meet
a contest of strength will occur.
Keep swinging wiimote
to win clash

Amuro Ray, a civilian boy, gets caught up in the war and 
grows tremendously as a Gundam pilot.

Shiro Amada, commander of the 08th MS Platoon..
Questions army's methods and pursues his own path.

Lines: Federal Forces test pilot Christina Mackenzie heads out
in new Gundam she is testing against an enemy attack

Text: Yuu Kajima, the pilot of an experimental aircraft equipped with the mysterious system 'EXAM' runs on the battlefield as the 'Blue Grim Reaper'

Char Aznable was feared as Zeon's Red Comet. 
An encounter with Gundam changes his fate...

Ramba Ral, also known as the ``Blue Giant.'' 
Receiving a special mission to avenge Garma Zabi, he approaches Gundam.

Gaia is the leader of a unit feared as the Black Tri-Star. 
Descending to the ground to defeat the White Base team.

Norris Packard is an ace of the Far East Army 
 serving Sakhalin family.
With his outstanding combat sense, he fights to overcome the situation.

Lines: Bernard Wiseman is a new soldier in the Cyclops Team. He carries
out the mission to destroy the new Gundam with determination.

Text:
Akahana of the Mad Angler Corps commanded by Char.
Riding an Acguy, he attempts sabotage inside Jaburo.

Lines: You can select the mission you want to play. However,
you cannot record scores, obtain MS/weapons, etc.

Text:
Select the Federation Army or Zeon Army
and play the original story.

You can play as ace pilots from both sides. 
You can simulate the famous situations of ace pilots.

Ace pilots will teach you the basics of the game. 
If you learn properly, there is nothing scary in combat

You can compete. To play 'VS 2P and 'VS TAG'
Open the HOME button menu and have 2P recognized.

3 minute score attack
VS 2P」Two players can compete.

Play original missions cooperatively with 2P.
Let's fight in harmony with each other.

You can see the details of the acquired MS and paint it.
You can also check the score record of each mission.
You can adjust the sound, screen, and vibration.

There are 4 levels: Easy/Medium/Hard/Ace.
